          <title>
            <string language="fi">Vahakoristelu 1</string>
            <string language="en">Wax decoration 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wachsdekoration 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décoration 1 de cire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Decoração 1 da cera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Decorazione 1 della cera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διακόσμηση 1 κεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Decoración 1 de la cera</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten savea voidaan koristella vahaa ja sivellintä hyödyntäen.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how clay can be decorated by utilising wax and a paint brush.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clay</string>
            <string language="en">brush</string>
            <string language="en">paint</string>
            <string language="en">wax</string>
            <string language="en">decorating</string>
            <string language="fi">sivellin</string>

            <string language="fi">koristelutekniikka</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">vahakoristelu</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie Lehm verziert werden 
kann, indem man Wachs und eine Farbe Bürste verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment de l'argile peut être 
décoré en utilisant la cire et un pinceau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como a argila pode ser decorada 
utilizando a cera e uma escova da pintura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come l'argilla può essere
decorata utilizzando la cera e un pennello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς ο άργιλος μπορεί να 
διακοσμηθεί με τη χρησιμοποίηση του κεριού και μιας βούρτσας 
χρωμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo la arcilla puede ser 
adornada utilizando la cera y un cepillo de la pintura.</string>
          </description>
